English: That wave has been taken care of.
I’m finished here too. *Sigh...* The monsters may have lessened in number, but this really never ends...
And it will continue as the Demons keep on expanding their territory... This must be hard on you.
I'm okay. It is my duty to look after this desert, after all.
Anyway, I think this should be enough for today. Why don’t you head back now?
It is your birthday today, Laudia.
It’s alright. Just like you, I also share this duty.
But-
I’m really okay. I was heading somewhere anyway.
Heading somewhere??
Well, a place I frequented ever since I was a kid... Do you want to come along?
It must be a special place. Yes, I would like to come along, if you don’t mind.
I didn't know a place like this existed...
It's very well maintained. Is this a place for ritual?
Nothing like that, but yes, I’ve been maintaining this place regularly.
This is sort of like a secret base I used when I was a kid. Oh boy, this is going to be a long story.
Please do tell. I’m curious.
Well, so I heard this when I was really young...
You’ve heard of it, right? The legend of the God Dragon who sleeps in the Shrine of Flow.
Yes. I heard the story a lot during my bedtime when I was young.
I was young back then, so I didn't realize at all that it was a story of something that had actually happened.
I just admired the God Dragon in the story because she is someone beautiful who blesses the desert with rain.
I thought that if the God Dragon ever wakes up, she will need a place to stay...
Thinking back to it now, it’s really absurd.
Well... You were just a kid back then. Besides, Laias herself might actually think of this story as something pleasantly funny.
Thank you. So anyway, my search for a cool place led me here.
‘I will play with the God Dragon here when she wakes up!’ I told myself that as I started cleaning this place.
It was not until I got a bit older when I realized.
Realize what?
That this place is too small for the God Dragon to stay.
Ahaha. True.
Still, it's nice to see well-organized flowers and the clean floor.
That's why I come to take care of this place whenever I have the time.
I see... So do you come here on every birthday?
Hmm? No, not really. This place just came to my mind because I had to speak to Laias quite often these days.
Since today is my birthday, I had some time to spare... So I wanted to spend that time visiting this place.
Ah, looks like I’ve come to the right place.
La-Laias?! How did you-
I’ve come to talk with you, Laudia.
Then I shall go out and give you both some privacy. Have a pleasant conversation.
So there’s a place like this in Aegina... Have you been maintaining this place by yourself?
Yes, I maintain this place whenever I have time.
The energy inside here is clean and pure... I can see that you gave so much effort to maintain this place over a long time.
What a beautiful place. Do you mind if I visit here from time to time?
Of course. You may come whenever you wish.
Thank you, now about the reason why I came to see you...
Please go ahead, I’m listening.
Happy birthday, Laudia. May the blessing of the flow be with you.
And although this may sound a bit sudden,
you have done a great job fighting off the Demons.
Thanks to your effort, the people of the desert smile once again.
As the keeper of the desert, I thank you.
I-I’m flattered... Thank you.
I apologize for interrupting your rest. I hope the rest of your day will be pleasant and good.
You don’t have to apologize... You've visited this place and congratulated my birthday personally, after all...
Might I ask what you two talked about?
Laias actually complimented me, saying that this place is beautiful... She wants to visit here from time to time.
...As a kid, I never imagined that I will one day get complimented by the God Dragon Laias herself.
It still feels like a dream...
So Laias will visit this place from time to time... Looks like your childhood dream has come true.
You're right... It’s good that I never gave up and kept trying.
Happy birthday, Clause!
Happy birthday to you, Clause!
We made this for you. Pretty, right?
Tee hee, Kasel spelled the name wrong.
Oh, come on, Frey! You promised you won’t bring that up!
Haha! Both of these are so nice!
Thank you so much! You two really are the best!
Back then, we were always the first to congratulate his birthday...
I know right...
Happy birthday, Clause!
You are the pride of Orvel! Happy birthday!
Haha, thank you always!
I will always try my best to meet your expectations.
Oh Clause, you don’t have to be so serious on your birthday too!
But I guess that’s what makes you so likable! Congratulations!
Maybe we can go in now?
Yeah, I think this is the right time. Let’s-
Captain?! Is something the matter?
No, I’ve come to see you. I see that you are surrounded by friends as usual.
This is Her Highness' present and her handwritten letter to you.
Happy birthday, Clause.
Happy birthday indeed!
I’ve prepared a wooden sculpture of you. Please take it.
Haha, thanks Loman!
Also, thank you so much for this, captain. I shall visit Her Highness and thank her personally later.
Please do so. Her Highness will be pleased.
And...
I would like to give you the title of the commander of knights today...
Oh, hahaha! Sorry, captain! I will have to refuse that.
I wish to help people more in my current position. I thank you for the offer, though.
I believe that it is my duty right now.
Failed... Again...
The captain was faster this time...
Clause is too popular.
...Let's wait just a bit more.
Yeah. We still have plenty of time.
Clause looks like he’s having a lot of fun.
When we were young, it was just the three of us at birthday parties...
Are you feeling left out?
Haha, you can tell?
It’s alright though. Clause is my brother.
Although it is sad that we don't get to spend time together as much as we used to.
Yeah...
Hahaha... This year’s birthday was a blast too.
Huh, I don’t think I saw Kasel and Frey... Maybe they are busy?
Well, Kasel just became an apprentice knight...
and Frey must be busy learning all the stuff too.
They’ve all grown up after all.
I remember that time when they gave me this... They were just little kids.
Hm? Oh, Clause!
Why are you alone? Where’s Kasel and Frey?
They were out looking for you!
What?
I thought they would be with you by now. Perhaps you missed each other?
Go look for them! They are probably still waiting for you.
Darn it...
Clause!\nClause!
Hey!! Have you both been waiting for me all this time?!
Haha, of course! It's your birthday, after all. We thought we would see you if we wait here.
Sorry, we are a bit late... but you will forgive us, right? Tee hee.
Kasel... Frey...
Of course. My birthday is incomplete without you guys.
Haha, don't mention it.
Happy birthday!
...My birthday is incomplete without you guys.
Just hang in there.
I’m coming for you both.
Finally, the day has arrived.
It's knucklehead’s birthday!
I’ve planned this over carefully twice already, fufufufu...
2 Days Ago
Great, that knucklehead’s birthday is coming soon... What a nuisance.
But I can’t just ignore it since he already gave me a gift before. I’m a fair dragon after all!
Oh, Laias!
Hmm? What is it?
Laias, for knuc- I mean, Neraxis's birthday, what are you going to give him?
Me? Well, since Neraxis wants to get stronger quickly...
I’m probably going to give him something helpful in battle.
Hm...
You haven’t decided yet? Want some help?
I-it’s alright! I can pick myself!
Fair enough, but make sure to tell me if you change your mind, okay?
Ugh... Laias is too kind and gentle. Talking to her doesn't help.
Hmm, I mean just an ordinary present is fine too,
but if I give him something really good, that’s actually going to make me feel strangely uncomfortable...
Oh right! I can give him that!
1 Day Ago
Laudia.
Oh, hello Lilia. What brings you here?
I have something to ask you.
Sure! I will gladly answer you as best as I can.
Hey um, do you know any cool-looking but useless items?
Cool-looking but useless?
Oh! This must be about the gift for Neraxis. Cool-looking but useless...
...Well, that statue you received from the God King as a birthday gift fits that criteria...
It should look convincing or fancy enough,
but useless to the recipient of the gift.
Fancy but useless...
Aha! Thanks! That helped!
And... Today.
What the? Why is he making that face on the morning of his birthday?
Maybe he's thinking about his previous family? Then maybe I should give him the present lat-
Actually, nooo! Laias must not be the first one he sees!
Hey knucklehead! Happy birthday!
Argh!
What the hell, moron?
That's not a nice thing to say to someone who came to congratulate your birthday!
Just shut up and take this! Happy birthday!
Um... Okay... Th-thanks...
Hey.
What?
What the hell is this?!
Did your head literally become a knuckle? You can't even recognize what that is?
No, of course I know what it is! I’m not asking that!
Of all things, why a chick decoration?!
What do you mean why? Because it’s cute! It's also a limited-edition!
Good morning, Neraxis. Happy birthday!
Oh my... Did you really buy that yourself, Lilia?
Of course! I’m not a kid anymore! I can find and buy something like that easily!
Wow, Lilia... You've really grown a lot... Where did you buy it from?
Well there’s this antique shop in front of Orvel Castle-
Hey, ki- I mean, Lilia, this thing is making a strange noise.
Wh-what? N-no way! It must be your imagination!
La-Laias! Let’s go make breakfast. We were going to make something delicious, right?
That’s odd... What is she scheming now?
HEEEYY!!! YOU LITTLE!!! WHAT THE HELL IS THIS???!!!
Kasel?
Kasel!
Oh, Frey.
What were you thinking about?
I’ve been calling you for a while. I was worried because you didn't respond.
Haha... Just... some random things.
Maybe it's because we are near the end of our journey...But I was just remembering a few things from our trip.
...Sad memories?
Haha, not really.
Like... when we first met Cleo and Roi,
or that day when we saved Naila and Selene...
Those kinds of things.
I see…
Come to think of it, we really went through a lot. We also met a lot of people...
And you know what, there was your birthday as well.
Oh right, my birthday... Hahaha.
That took place a short while after we met Cleo and Roi, right?
Yep, back then...
The Day of Kasel’s Birthday.
Are you sure I can just give you anything? You can tell me what you want as a gift.
Anything is fine, really. What’s important is that you cared.
But-
Also, we have something we have to take care of first.
I want to decide what I’m going to do with the Holy Sword first.
...Okay.
(That just makes me want to get him a better present...)
(Oh, right!)
Oh, I didn't realize the time has passed this much already... I will be back shortly, Frey.
I was supposed to pick up firewood for camping.
Sure! You do that.
Oooh, Kasel's birthday?
I know exactly what I should give him!
How about a King Slime? If not that, how about a gigantic, shiny golem?!
Those are the things YOU want.
No one wants a present like that except you.
Hey!! I was being serious!
Hahaha, of course you were.
Don't just laugh it off!
So Clause, was it? I get why Frey called you...
But we haven’t known each other for long, and we both don’t know much about Kasel. I’m not sure if we are going to be of much help.
I’m sorry if it was a bit too sudden.
I had hoped that maybe we could use this chance to get to know each other more...
Also, since you already know what Kasel is going through,
I wanted all of us to enjoy the party and make Kasel feel a bit better.
Ah, that last sentence is what you really want, isn't it? Tee hee.
Oh come on, do you always have to point out something like that directly? *Sigh*
Haha, you are pretty sharp, little lady.
I agree with Frey, though.
The fact that Kasel is now the new Master of the Holy Sword,
and that he has a long journey ahead of him...
We are the only ones who know that.
Kasel will walk an arduous path with a heavy burden on his back. I wish to encourage him even it’s just a little.
So please, just a tiny present of any sort will do.
Please join us in the celebration of his birthday.
Clause...
Wow... You guys are really serious about this... In that case...
.....Ummmmm...
Hmm... How about this then?
I knew Roi would come up with something! What is it?
That’s going to be fun! I’m not sure if I will be able to pull it off well though!
Haha, looks like we are going to be busy from now.
How about a slime? Can’t we do this with a slime?
......If you are really confident that you can do it, then by all means, go ahead.
Huzzah!!
Me... The Master of the Holy Sword...
Am I really fit for such task? I’m just an apprentice knight...
*Sigh...* I should stop. I shouldn't make Clause and Frey worry.
I will just have to give it some time... and accept it as time goes on.
*Cough cough*... What's all this smoke? Is something on fire!?
I knew this would happen...
Hey, come on! I tried my best, you know!
Cleo is right. There are well-cooked ones as well.
*Sigh...* Sure, of course... I will just shut up now.
Oh, Kasel! You are back!
We were just about to go out to look for you.
Huh? Am I that late?
Haha, no no. You've come at the right time.
But we should hurry. Everyone’s waiting.
Huh? Um... Okay.
Wh-what’s happening here?
Kasel! Welcome back!!
We did our best to cook, but I’m not sure if you are going to like this.
We used... different ingredients this time, but it tastes okay!
Huh? You cooked a meal, Frey? Where did you get the ingredients from?
Hee hee, you can thank this archmage right here!
Yeah, we had to throw out the slimes because you burned them too hard.
Gahhhh! Shut up! One more word and I’m going to roast you and serve you as a meal!
Cleo, where do you get such sick ideas? Actually, you know what? Forget about it.
Anyway, I told them we cooked too much,
...but they told me you usually eat this much.
Hahahaha! Yeah, Kasel here is a big eater.
So, do you like what you see? This is your birthday present!
All...of this?
But I didn't give you anything... I’m not sure if I deserve this...
Did you forget already?
You already saved our lives once.
He’s right! Also, we are going to stick together for a while, you know!
We are obviously going to care and celebrate your birthday! *Ahem...*
We are friends, aren’t we?!
You just wanted to say that...
Hahaha.
We know you are going through a hard time with many things to consider.
Go ahead and enjoy. It's the least we can do for you.
Roi is right. Today is that one special day of the year.
Everyone placed so much effort in creating this... So take it!
Clause... Everyone...
(Yes, as long as I’m with these people...)
(As long as I have everyone by my side... I’m...)
Happy birthday, Kasel!
...Thank you, everyone... Thank you so much!
This really is the birthday to remember for life!
You ended up eating all of that. Cleo and Roi were so surprised.
Yeah, that was actually a bit embarrassing... Everyone’s used to seeing it now though, haha.
...We are also quite used to Cleo and Roi now, aren't we?
Yeah. I feel like we’ve become close friends from then.
We should host another party for your birthday in the future.
We should invite Cleo, Roi, Clause...
and everyone we’ve met so far and for a grand party!
Hahaha, that sounds like fun.
I will count on you for another delicious feast then, Frey.
Leave it to me!!
There you were! Talking about something in secret?
We need you guys right now! Roi and Clause have something they wish to discuss with you!
Okay! We will be there soon!!
Let's go, Kasel.
Alright, Frey.
It was 8 years ago.
I don't remember much of that day.
But I do remember the one large light that approached me
when I was sobbing sadly amid the black mist.
It embraced me warmly,
and that is the only faint memory I have of that day.
Mirianne,
you are still young, but the world will not only see you as a little girl.
I shall remain as your home and the fence that protects you,
but I feel that you need means to protect yourself from any harm.
Here, take this.
Yes, grandpa.
Mirianne, what are you doing?
Oh! Sonia.
I suddenly remembered that day when grandpa gave me this dagger.
I guess I’m missing grandpa now..
We’ve been traveling together
away from the orphanage for a while.
Oh, that dagger is quite rusty.
Yes. I’ve been using it all the time since the day
I learned how to use a dagger from grandpa.
I’m using a different dagger now,
but this is grandpa’s first present to me.
I’ve always been carrying it since I got it from him.
Wow, I’m jealous of grandpa,
but I will not lose to him!
Here! This is my present!
This is what grandpa told me this before we left for this adventure.
Sonia, listen to me carefully.
As a guardian, you must care for your family.
Which means, don’t forget Mirianne’s birthday, and make her feel special that day! Hahaha!
Sure! You can count on me, grandpa!
...I have to care for my family.
Its name is Riventina.
It is a magical blade enchanted with speed-accelerating spell and a returning spel-
Thank you, Sonia!
Ooof... Mirianne, I can’t breathe...
(My friend, my family, and my soul mate
who accept me as who I am, and understand me...
Sonia.
I hope this happiness lasts forever.)
Oh no... Too many souls corrupted by darkness...
Rephy even lit the lamp... Is it not working?
Keep... your promise...
No... Rephy made a promise... Rephy said he will guide... even the souls corrupted by darkness... to the blue star...
Rephy must work harder... Rephy should...
But Rephy can’t... stand up...
There are still... so many lost souls that need me...
Rephy... Wake up...
Who... is it?
Someone is calling... Rephy... Who would...
Why you... Hey... wake up...
Familiar voice...
Rephy knows this voice...
Hey! I said wake up! Now!
Where am I..?
*Sigh...* How many times do I have to shout to wake you up?
When your elder says something, you pay attention and listen!
Chief? Something is not right... Rephy... became a Spiritual Guide... and left...
...Now, what are you babbling about? You still have so much to learn!
Anyway, this is important. Don’t doze off and listen carefully.
Hmm? O-okay...
Rephy... Um... Even if you would leave the town after becoming a Spiritual Guide...
when your birthday arrives, I want you to come back to your hometown.
We will hold a big celebration for your birthday.
Hmm? Chief, Rephy’s birthday is still far away. I don’t under-
Hey, I haven’t finished talking yet.
*Ahem...* I know I nag at you all the time,
but I also know how hard you are practicing to become a great Spiritual Guide.
Your birthday celebration is going to be grand, as you will be the pride of our kin in the future...
So I know you will be busy, but on your birthday, please visit our village. Can you do that for me?
Hm... Okay, chief! Rephy will come back to the village on my birthday even if I travel all over the world in the future!
Rephy, you are going to become a great Spiritual Guide. I know for sure.
I will look forward to seeing you expertly guide the lost souls to the Starlight Bridge.
Hehe. Thank you! Rephy will train hard to become a great Spiritual Guide who safely guides lost souls to the blue star!
Haha, I am glad to hear that.
Now, I’ve finished telling you what I wanted to tell you. Go back to where you have to be.
Huh? What do you mean, chief? Eh... chief?
Go now.
There are those waiting for you...
Even now, they're calling for you desperately.
Wait! Chief, Rephy doesn’t know what you are talking about!
Chief!
Oh, look here! He’s finally awake.
Don't be afraid. We luckily found you lying unconscious in Galluah and brought you here.
Where... is this place? Rephy was in-
You made me worry so much there!
I told you time after time to be careful! Just when will you listen?!
Please calm down, chief. He is the one who lit the God’s Lamp for the souls of Galluah, after all.
Yes... Rephy is okay. But why is chief and scholar lady here? You came to save Rephy?
Not too long ago, Oddy visited Elidora and told me about you.
He told me that you were heading to Ogria and asked if I could help you as you might lose your way.
The chief was with me at that time, so he helped me bring you back to safety.
Oh, hee hee... I see. Rephy will thank Uncle Oddy later.
...Are you really alright, Rephy?
I heard that you gave a part of your soul to the Undead to appease them.
Yes. Rephy is still a little tired, but chief and scholar lady are here now.
So Rephy is fine.
I was actually asking to check something else... Anyway, it’s good that I can hand this over to you.
Here, take this. I made this especially for you.
Wow! This is Star Candy, our village’s specialty! Rephy’s favorite!
Happy birthday, Rephy.
I wanted to throw a grand celebration for your birthday, but... it seems I was out of luck this time.
Birthday? Today is Rephy’s birthday?
Come on, Rephy... You shouldn't forget your own birthday!
Oh, so today was the Spiritual Guide’s birthday? If I had known that, I would have prepared something...
Hehe, it's okay! Both of you are here! That’s all Rephy needs!
Since we are all here,
I’m going to share this candy with everyone.
Hmm... Thank you. I’m truly grateful for your hospitality.
Haha, you’re all grown up now... Thank you.
Hee hee... Now then...
Thanks for the candy!
It’s been a while since I’ve had a break.
I was too busy fulfilling Nyx and Rephy’s request...
But since today is my birthday, I want to stay put and relax all day.
Hmm... According to what I’ve heard, Oddy should be here.
Yes! I heard that Uncle Oddy sang happily and went to the beach!
Nyx and Rephy?! What now?
Haha, there you are, my friend! So you’ve been relaxing here!
It was so hard to find you, Uncle Oddy!
The looks on your face tell me that...
You've brought new work!
However, today is my birthday. I want to just rest up and relax.
So come ask for help next time!
Oh! Uncle Oddy is running away!
No!! Don't go, Uncle Oddy!
Goodness, please listen to the rest!
Hmph, impressive! Now that’s my friend Oddy!
Y-you can compliment him later! Do something, Uncle Nyx!
Hahaha, sure! How about this?
*Huff* *Huff...* They aren't giving up!
Haha! Give up now, friend.
Ugh, I have no choice but to do this then!
Well! Didn't expect him to use the space-time portal to run away!
Uncle Oddy... Do you hate us that much?
Haha, I’m sure he has another reason for doing that. Let’s wait for a bit. He will be back soon.
Ouch, my back...
Looks like they haven't followed me here.
Now, where is this place?
Wow, what a pretty landscape!
Misty Hills... So this is where Rephy guides the souls to the Starlight Bridge?
It would have been nice to come here with him...
Wait, what am I saying now?
I’m going to go back before I disturb the souls here.
Ouch! Can’t I come out to someplace normal?
Let’s see... This place...
Wow, what a beautiful lake!
And those are... Ruins of a technomagic civilization!
I remember when Nyx told me we should investigate it together.
What a shame I didn't come here with him.
Wait, what am I saying again now?
Hmm... I should go back before it gets more dangerous.
Ouch! My buttocks!
My bum is going through a lot today!
Now, what is this place... Oh, so I’ve arrived at Juno’s inn.
Looks like someone's been preparing a party.
That cake looks really delicious.
Happy birthday, Uncle Oddy!
Oh... Ohh...
*Sob...* You folks are going to make me... cry!
I hope Uncle Oddy comes quickly.
Don't worry, Oddy knows how to be on time very well.
Just look at him. He’s here, see?
Nyx! Rephy! You little wondrous beings!
Haha, I told you to listen to the end.
You were so fast, Uncle Oddy! We didn't even have the chance to tell you!
But well, since you came at the right time, I guess we can call it mission accomplished.
Though I don’t know where you’ve been through, Uncle Oddy.
Happy birthday, Oddy!
Happy birthday, Uncle Oddy!! Eat as much cake as you can!
*Sob...* You cheeky adorable friends!
Please stay close and be my friends forever!
